Feature Notes:

Aura Of Evil: Visible to Detect Evil
Elf Blood: Counts as both elf and human for racial effects
Fiendish Boon: 1 selection
Low-Light Vision: x2 normal distance in poor light
Multitalented: May choose two favored classes

Craft (Bows): (int) 7 (+10) Heal: (wis) 1 (+8) Perception: (wis;cc) 1 (+9)

Keen Senses: +2 Perception
Skill Focus (Escape Artist): +3 Escape Artist
Skill Focus (Perception): +3 Perception
Child Of The Temple-1: Choice of Knowledge (Nobility) or Knowledge (Religion) is a class skill

Aura Of Cowardice: R10' Foes suffer -4 vs. fear and lose immunity to fear
Aura Of Despair (Antipaladin): R10' Foes suffer -2 on all saves
Elemental Channel (Air): May use Channel Energy to heal or harm Air outsiders
Fiendish Weapon: May add 2 enhancements and properties to a weapon for 10 min 2/dy
Smite Good: May gain +3 attack, +10 HP damage, bypass DR, and +3 AC vs. chosen good foe (+20 HP on first hit vs. outsider, dragon, cleric, or paladin) 4/dy
Save: Fortitude: +8; Reflex: +7; Will: +13

Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +1
Unholy Resilience: +3 Fortitude/+3 Reflex/+3 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +3
Elven Immunities: Immune to sleep effects, +2 vs. enchantment
Plague Bringer: Immune to effects of disease
Magic
Spell Slots: Antipaladin1: 3; Antipaladin2: 2; Antipaladin3: 1 Spell DC: Antipaladin: 13
Spells:
Animate Dead (Antipaladin3 Necr): Touched corpses become up to 14 HD of obedient skeletons or zombies
Bane (Antipaladin1 Ench): Foes in 50' radius suffer -1 attack and fear saves (DC 14 Will neg) for 7 min
Bestow Curse (Antipaladin3 Necr): Touched permanently suffers self choice of -6 ability, -4 attack, saves, and checks, or 50% chance/rd of losing action (DC 17 Will neg)
Bestow Curse (Cruelty3 Necr): Touched permanently suffers self choice of -6 ability, -4 attack, saves, and checks, or 50% chance/rd of losing action (DC 18 Will neg)
Blindness/Deafness (Antipaladin2 Necr): R170' Target suffers self choice of blindness or deafness (DC 16 Fort neg) permanently
Bull's Strength (Antipaladin2 Tran): Touched gains +4 Strength for 7 min
Cause Fear (Antipaladin1 Necr): R40' Target w/up to 5 HD flees for 1d4 rd (DC 15 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Command (Antipaladin1 Ench): R40' Target obeys self commands to approach, drop, fall, flee, or halt (DC 14 Will neg) for 1 rd
Contagion (Antipaladin3 Necr): Touched contracts random disease (DC 17 Fort neg)
Contagion (Cruelty3 Necr): Touched contracts random disease (DC 18 Fort neg)
Corruption Resistance (Antipaladin2 Abju): Touched gains DR 10/- vs. chosen alignment magical damage for 70 min
Curse Water (Antipaladin1 Necr): Makes touched 1 pint of water unholy (DC 15 Will neg)
Darkness (Antipaladin2 Evoc): Touched reduces light level by 1 in 20' radius for 7 min
Darkvision (Antipaladin2 Tran): Touched sees 60' in total darkness for 7 hr
Death Knell (Antipaladin1 Necr): Touched w/negative HP dies, and self gains 1d8 temporary HP, +2 Strength, and +1 caster level for 10*target HD min (DC 15 Will neg)
Deeper Darkness (Antipaladin3 Evoc): Touched reduces light level by 2 in 60' radius for 7 min
Defile Armor (Antipaladin3 Abju): Touched armor gives +1 AC, plus DR 5/good while using Judgment or Smite for 7 min
Desecrate (Antipaladin2 Evoc): R40' 20' radius gives +3 DC vs. negative channel, undead +1 attack, damage, saves, and 1 temporary HP/HD for 14 hr
Detect Good (Detect Good1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on good auras for conc or 100 min
Detect Poison (Antipaladin1 Divi): R40' Self detects poison in target, DC 20 Wis or Alchemy check for type
Disguise Self (Antipaladin1 Illu): Self changes appearance and gains +10 Disguise for 70 min
Dispel Good (Antipaladin4 Abju): Self gains +4 AC vs. good and dismisses good creature via touch (DC 17 Will neg) or spell
Dispel Law (Antipaladin4 Abju): Self gains +4 AC vs. lawful and dismisses lawful creature via touch (DC 17 Will neg) or spell
Dispel Magic (Antipaladin3 Abju): R170' Successful d20+7 check vs. 11+caster level cancels targeted spell or 1 spell on targeted creature
Doom (Antipaladin1 Necr): R170' Target becomes shaken (-2 attack, damage, saves, and checks) (DC 15 Will neg) for 7 min
Eagle's Splendor (Antipaladin2 Tran): Touched gains +4 Charisma for 7 min
Fear (Antipaladin4 Necr): R30' Cone causes creatures to flee for 7 rd (DC 18 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Greater Invisibility (Antipaladin4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for 7 rd
Greater Magic Weapon (Antipaladin3 Tran): R40' target weapon gains +1 attack and damage for 7 hr
Hold Person (Antipaladin2 Ench): R170' Immobilizes target humanoid (DC 15 Will neg) for 7 rd
Inflict Light Wounds (Antipaladin1 Necr): Touched suffer (undead heal) 1d8+5 HP (DC 15 Will half)
Inflict Moderate Wounds (Antipaladin3 Necr): Touched suffer (undead heal) 2d8+7 HP (DC 17 Will half)
Inflict Serious Wounds (Antipaladin4 Necr): Touched suffer (undead heal) 3d8+7 HP (DC 18 Will half)
Invisibility (Antipaladin2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for 7 min or until attacks
Magic Circle Against Good (Antipaladin3 Abju): 10' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves vs. good creatures, extra save to suppress mental control, bars contact and entry (SR neg) by good summoned creatures for 70 min or traps nonevil summoned creatures (SR neg) for 7 dy
Magic Circle Against Law (Antipaladin3 Abju): 10' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves vs. lawful creatures, extra save to suppress mental control, bars contact and entry (SR neg) by lawful summoned creatures for 70 min or traps nonchaotic summoned creatures (SR neg) for 7 dy
Magic Weapon (Antipaladin1 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and damage for 7 min
Nondetection (Antipaladin3 Abju): Touched gains SR 18 (divination) (self SR 22) for 7 hr
Poison (Antipaladin4 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Poison (Cruelty4 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Protection From Good (Antipaladin1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. good creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by good summoned creatures for 7 min
Protection From Law (Antipaladin1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. lawful creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by lawful summoned creatures for 7 min
Read Magic (Antipaladin1 Divi): Self can read magical writing for 70 min
Resounding Blow (Antipaladin4 Evoc): Self hits w/held weapon inflict +1d6 HP sonic, plus staggered 1 rd while using Judgment or Smite (DC 17 Fort neg); crit inflicts stunned 1 rd and deafened 1d6 rd (DC 17 Fort neg), for 7 rd
Scare (Antipaladin2 Necr): R40' 2 targets w/up to 5 HD in 30' radius flee for 7 rd (DC 16 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Silence (Antipaladin2 Illu): R680' Bars sound in 20' radius (DC 15 Will neg if targeted) for 7 rd
Slay Living (Antipaladin4 Necr): Touched suffers 12d6+7 HP (DC 18 Fort 3d6+7 HP)
Summon Monster I (Antipaladin1 Conj): R40' 1 1st-level creature appears and fights foes for 7 rd
Summon Monster II (Antipaladin2 Conj): R40' 1 2nd- or 1d3 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 7 rd
Summon Monster III (Antipaladin3 Conj): R40' 1 3rd-, 1d3 2nd-, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 7 rd
Summon Monster IV (Antipaladin4 Conj): R40' 1 4th-, 1d3 3rd-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 7 rd
Undetectable Alignment (Antipaladin2 Abju): R40' Conceals target alignment (DC 15 Will neg) for 1 dy
Vampiric Touch (Antipaladin3 Necr): Touched suffers 3d6 HP, self gains same as temporary HP for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Charisma Antipaladin Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Antipaladin1, Antipaladin2, Antipaladin3
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 5d6 HP (DC 18 Will half) 6/dy
Channel Negative Energy: May expend 2 Touch Of Corruption uses to use Channel Energy effects
Cruelty: Touch Of Corruption inflicts choice of diseased as Contagion, exhausted, sickened for 10 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Detect Good: May use Detect Good effects at will
Merciful Spell: May cast spells to inflict nonlethal damage
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Touch Of Corruption: Touch inflicts 5d6 HP w/out provoking AOO or heals undead 8/dy
